WITH CategoryOutbounds AS ( -- 从 once_fill 表查询 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m') as month, c.title AS category, c.id AS category_id, SUM(o.unit_price * o.quantity) AS amount FROM once_fill o JOIN categories c ON RIGHT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(o.apply_remark, '-', -1), LENGTH(c.title)) = c.title AND c.id NOT IN (SELECT parent_id FROM categories WHERE parent_id IS NOT NULL) AND c.parent_id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM categories WHERE title = '销售出库') WHERE DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y') = #{year} AND DATE_FORMAT(time, '%m') = #{month} AND o.depositoryId= #{depositoryId} AND c.depository_id= #{depositoryId} AND o.introduce !='立项'
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m'), c.id, c.title
UNION ALL
-- 从 depository_record 表查询 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(apply_time, '%Y-%m') as month, c.title AS category, c.id AS category_id, SUM(d.price * d.quantity) AS amount FROM depository_record d JOIN categories c ON RIGHT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(d.apply_remark, '-', -1), LENGTH(c.title)) = c.title AND c.id NOT IN (SELECT parent_id FROM categories WHERE parent_id IS NOT NULL) AND c.parent_id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM categories WHERE title = '销售出库') WHERE d.type = 0 AND d.review_pass = 1 AND d.depository_id= #{depositoryId} AND c.depository_id= #{depositoryId} AND DATE_FORMAT(apply_time, '%Y') = #{year} AND DATE_FORMAT(apply_time, '%m') = #{month} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(apply_time, '%Y-%m'), c.id, c.title ) SELECT month, category, ROUND(SUM(amount)) AS amount FROM CategoryOutbounds GROUP BY month, category, category_id ORDER BY month, category_id;

WITH AllMonths AS ( SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-01') AS month UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-02') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-03') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-04') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-05') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-06') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-07') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-08') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-09') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-10') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-11') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-12') ), combined_data AS ( -- 出库记录部分 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dr.apply_time, '%Y-%m') AS month, mt.tname AS material_type, SUM(IFNULL(dr.quantity, 0) * IFNULL(dr.price, 0)) AS total_amount FROM depository_record dr JOIN material_type mt ON dr.type_name = mt.tname WHERE dr.type = 0 AND DATE_FORMAT(dr.apply_time, '%Y') = #{year} AND dr.type_name = #{categoryTitle} AND dr.depository_id = #{depositoryId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(dr.apply_time, '%Y-%m'), mt.tname
UNION ALL
-- 一次性领用部分 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(off.time, '%Y-%m') AS month, mt.tname AS material_type, SUM(IFNULL(off.price, 0)) AS total_amount FROM once_fill off JOIN material_type mt ON off.type_id = mt.id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(off.time, '%Y') = #{year} AND mt.tname = #{categoryTitle} AND off.depositoryId = #{depositoryId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(off.time, '%Y-%m'), mt.tname )
SELECT am.month, cd.material_type AS category, ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(cd.total_amount), 0), 3) AS amount FROM AllMonths am LEFT JOIN combined_data cd ON am.month = cd.month GROUP BY am.month, cd.material_type ORDER BY am.month ASC;

WITH ordered AS ( SELECT dr.*, DATE_FORMAT(apply_time, '%Y-%m') AS apply_month, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY at_id ORDER BY apply_time) AS rn FROM depository_record dr WHERE type = 1 AND review_pass = 1 AND depository_id = 2 ), pairs AS ( SELECT curr.at_id, curr.mname, curr.price AS current_price, curr.apply_time AS current_review_time, curr.apply_month AS current_month, prev.price AS previous_price, prev.apply_time AS previous_review_time, prev.apply_month AS previous_month, ROUND( CASE WHEN prev.price = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (curr.price - prev.price) / prev.price * 100 END , 2) AS price_change_percent FROM ordered curr LEFT JOIN ordered prev ON curr.at_id = prev.at_id AND prev.apply_time < curr.apply_time AND prev.apply_month <> curr.apply_month WHERE curr.apply_time >= #{startDate} AND curr.apply_time < #{endDate} AND prev.apply_time = ( SELECT MAX(p2.apply_time) FROM ordered p2 WHERE p2.at_id = curr.at_id AND p2.apply_time < curr.apply_time AND p2.apply_month <> curr.apply_month ) ), latest_per_atid AS ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY at_id ORDER BY current_review_time DESC) AS rn FROM pairs ) t WHERE rn = 1 ) SELECT * FROM latest_per_atid ORDER BY current_review_time DESC;
